participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Empathetic and friendly, enjoys connecting with others through shared interests.
participant_1.background: My dad is a veteran. I listen to all kinds of music. I love watching funny movies. I like to play tennis.

participant_2.name: Michael
participant_2.personality: Outgoing and creative, loves teaching and exploring new hobbies.
participant_2.background: I teach at a large school. My class has 26 kids. I graduated college in 2016. I enjoy kayaking in my free time. I teach kindergarten.

content.text: I'm so sorry to hear that about your dad. I hope he's doing better.
Thanks. He's doing better. He's been in the hospital for a few weeks, but he's coming home soon.
I'm glad to hear you like all kinds of music. I'm a big fan of classic rock.
Me too! I love Led Zeppelin, Pink Floyd, and The Beatles.
Those are all great bands! I also like The Rolling Stones, The Who, and The Doors.
Nice! I like to watch funny movies too. What are some of your favorites?
I love the Monty Python movies, and I also like The Office, Parks and Recreation, and Arrested Development.
Those are all great shows! I love Monty Python too.
Me too! What kind of music do you like to play?
I mostly play rock and roll. I play guitar and sing.
That's awesome! I love to play music too. I play piano and sing.
That's great! We should play together sometime.
